results.title: Overwatch
results.brief_description:
In Overwatch, you control one of several heroes in competitive 6-person team shooting matches. Battle over objectives, take down the other team, and achieve victory.

In Overwatch, heroes do battle in diverse locations around the world. From the technological marvel of Numbani to the manufacturing powerhouse of Volskaya, each map has a unique layout and specific win conditions that your team must meet in order to secure victory.
results.description:
Soldiers. Scientists. Adventurers. Oddities.

In a time of global crisis, an international task force of heroes banded together to restore peace to a war-torn world:

OVERWATCH.

It ended the crisis and helped to maintain peace in the decades that followed, inspiring an era of exploration, innovation, and discovery. But after many years, Overwatch’s influence waned, and it was eventually disbanded.

Overwatch is gone… but the world still needs heroes.

results.title: Overview of 8mm production
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Film making techniques”.
This film introduces the student to a general background on the making of 8mm films. Attention is given to the kinds of equipment required, the use of camera and film editing.

results.title: Overture: Linh from Vietnam
results.creator_credit: Seth Pinsker, Elaine Sperber and Learning Corporation of America
results.brief_description: Docudrama which tells about young Linh Tran and her family, who have settled into their first real home since immigrating to America from Vietnam. Discusses the social hardships they incur, the adjustments they must make to a new culture, and the girl’s friendship with a Mexican-American boy. Cast includes: Pandito Gomez, Kim Ngan Ly, Michael Leon and Stanley Brock

results.title: Overture
results.creator_credit: United Nations. Dept. of Public Information
results.brief_description: Beethoven’s “Egmont Overture”, played by the Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Carl Schuricht, is a musical background for scenes symbolising the work of the United Nations in combating disease, ignorance, war, devastation, starvation and misery.

results.title: Overtaking and being overtaken
results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “The Skills of Defensive Driving”.
Suggests ways in which the defensive driver can overtake and how to react to being overtaken. Shows the pitfalls leading to accidents while overtaking and being overtaken. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Overspill
results.creator_credit: Mort Ransen, John Kemeny, Tom Daly, Svenska filminstitutet and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description: A film about Norrbotten, in northernmost Sweden, where industrial and agricultural patterns have changed and people are being relocated in industrial towns far from the life they have loved. In a series of interviews we meet people who have known the dignity of independence and who have suddenly become welfare cases. The film asks: Are their lives being improved? How can we reconcile human values and economic needs?

results.title: Overseas and undersold. Part 2
results.creator_credit: Paul Hawker, Bob Hill, Don Murray and Film Australia
results.brief_description: Part two of a two part series examining Australia’s international relations with overseas markets. Each episode gives a detailed background to individual markets and territories, as well as examining the financial opportunities available to Australian business. The series also examines mistakes made by Australian business in pursuing international competitiveness. Includes interviews with business leaders, economists and politicians. This volume examines the economies of Thailand, New Zealand, the Middle East and the United States. The last episode of this volume is a summation of the changes in Australian markets over the last decade.

results.title: Overnight Sensation
results.brief_description: A drama that focuses on a man’s reaction to the unexpected success of his wife’s first novel. The husband, who sees his wife in a traditional role, is compelled to deal with a radically new perspective on their relationship. Departing from the original plot, the film’s ambiguous ending allows viewers to make their own interpretation of the conclusion.
